titles.title: To extend the authorization for the Cape Cod National Seashore Advisory Commission.
To extend the authorization for the Cape Cod National Seashore Advisory Commission.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Lands.
Mr. McClintock moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 5585.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on National Parks. Hearings held.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands
committee.name: House Natural Resources

bill.summary: This bill extends the Cape Cod National Seashore Advisory Commission through September 25, 2028.
